attributes.action: zero rate funeral expenses and memorials for deceased children under 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This issue came to my attention when following the sad death of my Daughter’s first child in childbirth she and her husband recently went to purchase a headstone for their son’s grave.  They were surprised that they were asked to pay VAT on the price as am I.  Vat is 0% on children’s clothes and on School meals but bereaved parents have to pay at the full rate for funeral expenses and memorials for their lost children.
To me this would seem an anomaly, given the exemption for other items and I wonder if consideration should be given to making funeral expenses and memorials for under 16’s being zero rated.  Cost would be an issue but the total amount of revenue loss involved would be relatively small.  I feel that the Vat on memorials and funeral expenses is unfortunate, an extra expense at sad and emotional time for those involved.
